Austin Pendleton https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Austin_Pendleton 0 Austin Campbell Pendleton (born March 27, 1940) is an American actor, playwright, theatre director and instructor. Austin_Campbell_Pendleton ( born March_27_,_1940 ) is an_American_actor , playwright , theatre_director_and_instructor .
